scripts.start:agent: VITE_HC_PORT=$(port) VITE_HC_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) UI_PORT=5173 concurrently "pnpm --filter ./ui dev" "pnpm launch:happ"
scripts.launch:happ: hc s clean && echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc s --piped -f=$VITE_HC_ADMIN_PORT generate ./workdir/deepkey.happ --run=$VITE_HC_PORT -a deepkey network mdns
scripts.network:launcher: hc s clean && UI_PORT=5173 concurrently "pnpm --filter ./ui start" "pnpm run launch:happ:launcher" "playground"
scripts.launch:happ:launcher: echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/deepkey.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network mdns
scripts.start:happ: echo "starting with admin $VITE_HC_ADMIN_PORT" && RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s -f=$VITE_HC_ADMIN_PORT --piped generate workdir/deepkey.happ --run=$VITE_HC_PORT -a deepkey network mdns
scripts.test: hc app pack workdir --recursive && pnpm test --filter tests
scripts.package: pnpm run --filter ./ui package && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
